languages.text:
"Но обратилися в камни лихие слова,
Холод могильный сковал их в горле ослабшем.

"But the bold words turned to stone,
The cold of the grave chaining
them in the weakened throat.
languages.original_text:
"Но обратилися в камни лихие слова,
Холод могильный сковал их в горле ослабшем.

traits.locale_text:
"But the bold words turned to stone,
The cold of the grave chaining
them in the weakened throat.

"But the bold words turned to stone,
The cold of the grave chaining
them in the weakened throat.

"Но обратилися в камни лихие слова,
Холод могильный сковал их в горле ослабшем.

"But the bold words turned to stone,
The cold of the grave chaining
them in the weakened throat.

languages.text:
「しかし、大胆な言葉は石に変わり
墓場の冷たさが
弱った喉を締めつけた。
languages.original_text:
"But the bold words turned to stone,
The cold of the grave chaining
them in the weakened throat.

traits.locale_text:
「しかし、大胆な言葉は石に変わり
墓場の冷たさが
弱った喉を締めつけた。

languages.text:
“但一切豪言壮语最终石沉大海，
冰冷的坟冢，
将其扼杀在喑哑的喉咙中。”
languages.original_text:
"But the bold words turned to stone,
The cold of the grave chaining
them in the weakened throat.

traits.locale_text:
“但一切豪言壮语最终石沉大海，
冰冷的坟冢，
将其扼杀在喑哑的喉咙中。”

languages.text:
« Mais le discours hardi,
par le froid de la tombe alourdi,
demeura lettre morte
dans la gorge affaiblie. »
languages.original_text:
"But the bold words turned to stone,
The cold of the grave chaining
them in the weakened throat.

traits.locale_text:
« Mais le discours hardi,
par le froid de la tombe alourdi,
demeura lettre morte
dans la gorge affaiblie. »

languages.text:
«Pero las osadas palabras quedaron en nada,
con el frío de la tumba encadenándolas
en su garganta debilitada».
languages.original_text:
"But the bold words turned to stone,
The cold of the grave chaining
them in the weakened throat.

traits.locale_text:
«Pero las osadas palabras quedaron en nada,
con el frío de la tumba encadenándolas
en su garganta debilitada».

languages.text:
"Doch die kühnen Worte wurden zu Stein,
die Kälte des Grabs fror sie ein
in der geschwächten Kehle.
languages.original_text:
"But the bold words turned to stone,
The cold of the grave chaining
them in the weakened throat.

traits.locale_text:
"Doch die kühnen Worte wurden zu Stein,
die Kälte des Grabs fror sie ein
in der geschwächten Kehle.

languages.text:
"Cüretkâr sözler taşa döndü.
Mezarın soğuk kolları,
Onları zayıflığa zincirledi.
languages.original_text:
"But the bold words turned to stone,
The cold of the grave chaining
them in the weakened throat.

traits.locale_text:
"Fakat cüretkâr sözler taşa döndü.
Mezarın soğuk kolları,
zincirledi onları zayıflığa.
